title: Willie Byrd
text: Willie Byrd is an American professional <a href="Canadian%20football">football</a> player who is currently a <a href="free%20agent">free agent</a>. He most recently played for the <a href="Saskatchewan%20Roughriders">Saskatchewan Roughriders</a> of the <a href="Canadian%20Football%20League">Canadian Football League</a> (CFL). Byrd has previously played in the CFL for the <a href="Winnipeg%20Blue%20Bombers">Winnipeg Blue Bombers</a> and <a href="Calgary%20Stampeders">Calgary Stampeders</a>, spending most of his time on <a href="special%20teams">special teams</a>. Byrd played <a href="college%20football">college football</a> at four different schools (<a href="William%20Penn">William Penn</a>, Garden State Community College, <a href="North%20Dakota%20State">North Dakota State</a> and <a href="Miles%20College">Miles College</a>).
